question: List symptoms of the Zieve's syndrome.
ideal_answer: Zieve's syndrome, characterized by jaundice, hyperlipidaemia and haemolytic anaemia. It usually develops in young, chronically alcoholic subjects with enlarged fatty liver. It may rarely occur with intracranial haemorrhage.
